entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Coral Harbour Airport 01:52 AM EST Monday 27 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.1°C

Visibility: 19.3 km
Humidity: 90 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow and blowing snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow in the afternoon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 early in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM EST Sunday 26 March 2023
